mapper.select: SELECT a.username, a.password, a.email, a.nick_name, c.id as roleId, c.`name` as roleName FROM ums_admin a INNER JOIN ums_admin_role_relation b on a.id=b.admin_id INNER JOIN ums_role c on b.role_id=c.id WHERE a.username=#{userName}
select id, parent_id, title, level, sort, name, icon, hidden, url from ums_menu where level = #{level}
